root.name: Road Rash: Jailbreak
root.description: 1-4 Player Motorcycle Racing Combat. Solo Game ModesJail Break: The full campaign. Run with a gang and rise through the ranks to prove you have what it takes to bust Spaz out of the slammer.Five-0: You're The Man. Patrol the streets and deliver your own brand of justice.Time Trial: It's you against the clock. Thrash some records and become a legend.Multiplayer Game ModesSkull-To-Skull: Go head-to-head with a second player in a split-screen war.Cops Robbers: Play as a cop on the hunt or an escapee in the making. One of each required.Side Car (Co-Op): One bike, two riders, and a whole mess of ornery opponents.Side Car (Vs.): Engage in split-screen side car action for up to four players.Time Trials: Compete with up to six players in an alternating race against the clock.
